s: Kind of. Please note: Cybershoes is always a seated experience. When walking in place using leg-strides, you need something to hold you on the spot. With Cybershoes, it is a comfortable chair. t: Cybershoes Let Me Stroll Through Skyrim. It Was Awesome. | Digital Trends
s: February 22, 2019 - After being funded in just two hours on Kickstarter back in October 2018, Cybershoes has earned itself a place among some of the coolest VR walking and running tech at CES 2019. Compact, easy to use, and incredibly fun, they stand out among the competition, but will they become a staple?
